headline: Joe Biden Biden S Physician Deems Him Fit Duty No Cognitive Test Conducted

Arecent special counsel’s reportdescribed Biden as an “elderly man with a poor memory.” Theexamination’s lack of a cognitive assessmentled to pushback from right-rated voices. 2024 GOP frontrunner and former President Donald Trump posted on Truth Social thatall presidential candidates should take a cognitive test. Trump used the opportunity to claim his fitness for another term in office, highlighting that he had successfully completed the cognitive tests twice during his presidency. Former White House physician Rep. Ronny Jackson (R-TX) remarked that Biden's latest physical was a “complete joke” for the omission of a cognitive examHow The Media Covered It:Concerns over Biden’s age and cognitive ability were widespread across outlets with varying biases.The Washington Examiner (Lean Right bias)focused coverage on Representative Ronny Jackson's remarks on the omission of a cognitive exam.The Daily Beast (Left bias)focused on the physician’s assessment that Biden is “fit for duty,” while also acknowledging the absence of a cognitive evaluation and relating it to Republicans’ criticisms.This summary was developed with the help of AllSides' AI technology.
